Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orcâ€™s own blood.

Animal companions or bonded animals you have gain the Orc Ferocity feat, and they gain a reaction they can use only for Orc Ferocity.

If you have the @Compendium[world.feats-apg-data-entry.wpHrGA4ajgnYajXM]{Undying Ferocity} ancestry feat, all animal companions or bonded animals you have also gain the benefits of that feat when using the Orc Ferocity reaction.
